title: E_NOTICE thrown when generating coverage report
body:
Judging from the error, this looks like it's related to ignored lines.

Stack trace:

```
Notice: Undefined offset: 40 in /Users/evert/pear/share/pear/PHP/CodeCoverage/Util.php on line 126

Call Stack:
    0.0002     646136   1. {main}() /Users/evert/pear/bin/phpunit:0
    0.0029    1201376   2. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command::main() /Users/evert/pear/bin/phpunit:46
    0.0029    1202432   3. PHPUnit_TextUI_Command->run() /Users/evert/pear/share/pear/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:129
    0.3057   14312928   4. PHPUnit_TextUI_TestRunner->doRun() /Users/evert/pear/share/pear/PHPUnit/TextUI/Command.php:176
    6.6609   23842496   5. PHP_CodeCoverage_Report_HTML->process() /Users/evert/pear/share/pear/PHPUnit/TextUI/TestRunner.php:384
    6.6609   23842552   6. PHP_CodeCoverage->getReport() /Users/evert/pear/share/pear/PHP/CodeCoverage/Report/HTML.php:120
    6.6615   23905392   7. PHP_CodeCoverage_Report_Factory->create() /Users/evert/pear/share/pear/PHP/CodeCoverage.php:158
    6.6654   24374800   8. PHP_CodeCoverage_Report_Factory->addItems() /Users/evert/pear/share/pear/PHP/CodeCoverage/Report/Factory.php:75
    8.2537   32914984   9. PHP_CodeCoverage_Report_Node_Directory->addFile() /Users/evert/pear/share/pear/PHP/CodeCoverage/Report/Factory.php:93
    8.2537   32918576  10. PHP_CodeCoverage_Report_Node_File->__construct() /Users/evert/pear/share/pear/PHP/CodeCoverage/Report/Node/Directory.php:210
    8.2537   32918768  11. PHP_CodeCoverage_Util::getLinesToBeIgnored() /Users/evert/pear/share/pear/PHP/CodeCoverage/Report/Node/File.php:168
```

Not a big deal, since things are still working, but I thought you would care to know :)

This is on PHP 5.3.15 (default OS X). This can be replicated with this project: https://github.com/evert/sabre-vobject
